title: Q&A: Our Most Challenging Question Yet
itunes:title: Q&A: Our Most Challenging Question Yet

description:
PANTS with Kate Moennig and Leisha Hailey

Produced by Melisa D. Monts and Diamond MPrint Productions

 

This week Kate and Leisha are catching up after a chaotic start to their hiatus. Then, they answer questions about marriage, their least favorite aspects of Shane and Alice, and how they like doing the podcast.

 

Follow us on Twitter @ThePantsPod

Follow us on Instagram @ThePantsPod

Email us: pantspodcast@yahoo.com

Music: Carol Parra @csssuxxx

Artwork: Lovefoxxx


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
